SEARCH
Package PflichtÜbung4

Klasse Crypto

java.lang.Object
PflichtÜbung4.Crypto
class Crypto extends Object
The Crypto class provides methods for Caesar cipher encryption and decryption. It includes password validation and handling of shift values for encryption.

  • Methodendetails

    • checkPassword

      public static boolean checkPassword(String inputPassword)
      Checks if the input password matches the predefined password.
      Parameter:
      inputPassword - the password entered by the user
      Gibt zurück:
      true if the passwords match, false otherwise

    • normalizeShiftValue

      public static int normalizeShiftValue(int shift)
      Normalizes the shift value to ensure it is within the range of 0-25.
      Parameter:
      shift - the original shift value
      Gibt zurück:
      the normalized shift value

    • caesarEncrypt

      public static String caesarEncrypt(String textToEncrypt, int shift)
      Encrypts the given text using the Caesar cipher with the specified shift value.
      Parameter:
      textToEncrypt - the text to be encrypted
      shift - the shift value for the Caesar cipher
      Gibt zurück:
      the encrypted text

    • normalizeShiftValueAndSetShiftAsPrefix

      public static String normalizeShiftValueAndSetShiftAsPrefix(int shift, String encryptedText)
      Prepares the encrypted text by adding a prefix of the normalized shift value.
      Parameter:
      shift - the shift value used for encryption
      encryptedText - the encrypted text
      Gibt zurück:
      the encrypted text with the shift value as a prefix

    • caesarDecrypt

      public static String caesarDecrypt(String textToDecrypt, int shift)
      Decrypts the given text using the Caesar cipher with the specified shift value.
      Parameter:
      textToDecrypt - the text to be decrypted
      shift - the shift value for the Caesar cipher
      Gibt zurück:
      the decrypted text

    • extractShiftValueFromEncryptedTextWithShiftPrefix

      public static int extractShiftValueFromEncryptedTextWithShiftPrefix(String textToDecryptWithShift)
      Extracts the shift value from the encrypted text that includes a shift value prefix.
      Parameter:
      textToDecryptWithShift - the encrypted text with the shift value prefix
      Gibt zurück:
      the extracted shift value

    • extractEncryptedTextFromEncryptedTextWithShiftPrefix

      public static String extractEncryptedTextFromEncryptedTextWithShiftPrefix(String textToDecryptWithShift)
      Extracts the actual encrypted text from the text that includes a shift value prefix.
      Parameter:
      textToDecryptWithShift - the encrypted text with the shift value prefix
      Gibt zurück:
      the extracted encrypted text
